trans-unit.source: Provides an interface to manage a template editing area.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> interface is obsolete.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> property to access template groups, and template definitions within template groups, for a control designer.
A template editing frame represents the UI for a template editor of a templated control designer.
Closes the control and optionally saves any changes.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> interface is obsolete.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup.GroupStyle%2A> property on each template group element in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> collection of a control designer.
`true` if changes to the document should be saved; otherwise, `false`.
Gets the style for the editing frame.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> interface is obsolete.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup.GroupStyle%2A> property on each template group element in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> collection of a control designer.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that represents the Web server control style attributes for the editing frame.
Gets or sets the initial height of the control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> interface is obsolete.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> property in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup.GroupStyle%2A> property for each template group element in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> collection of a control designer.
The initial height of the control.
Gets or sets the initial width of the control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> interface is obsolete.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> property in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup.GroupStyle%2A> property for each template group element in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> collection of a control designer.
The initial width of the control.
Gets the name of the editing frame.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> interface is obsolete.

The template group name is provided in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup.GroupName%2A> property of each template group element in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> collection of a control designer.
The name of the editing frame.
Opens and displays the control.
Resizes the control to the specified width and height.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> interface is obsolete.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup.GroupStyle%2A> property on each template group element in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> collection of a control designer.
The new width for the control.
The new height for the control.
Saves any changes to the document.
Gets a set of names of templates to use.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> interface is obsolete.
A template name is provided through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject.Name%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition> object.

Enumerate the collection of template definitions by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup.Templates%2A> property of each <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> element in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> collection of a control designer.
An array of template names.
Gets the template styles for the control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> interface is obsolete.
A template style is provided through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition.Style%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition> object.

Enumerate the collection of template definitions by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup.Templates%2A> property of each <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> element in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> collection of a control designer.
An array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> objects that represent the template styles for the control.
Changes the name of the control to the specified name.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> interface is obsolete.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup.GroupStyle%2A> property on each template group element in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> collection of a control designer.
The new name for the control.
Gets or sets the verb that invokes the template.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> interface is obsolete.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup.GroupName%2A> property of each template group in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> collection for a control designer.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb"></xref> that invokes the template.
